title: The Post Office
subtle: Concept (fiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR20L
description: The Post Office introduces students to what they might see and do at a post office. Detailed, colorful illustrations will engage students in the text, and repetition of the high-frequency word the will support early emergent readers. Students will also have the opportunity to identify the setting as well as to ask and answer questions to better understand the story.
reviewWords: letter, line, mailbox, scale, stamp, worker
wordWork: Color Words                : Identify and use color words
